Pre-Game Insights: India have to win the third ODI against Sri Lanka to square the three-match series 1-1.
Sri Lanka picked up a huge win over India in the second ODI with an inspiring performance from their bowling unit.
The Indian cricket team's highly recognised batting lineup faltered in tough conditions twice in the series.
Jeffrey Vandersay picked up a six-wicket haul on his return to the Sri Lankan playing XI in the second ODI.
Rohit Sharma scored two quick-fire fifties in a row on difficult pitches.
